data.title: Radynversion: Solar atmospheric properties during a solar flare
data.name: Radynversion
data.description: Inverting Solar Flare Observations with Invertible Neural Nets (with RADYN physics)

evidence: README mentions releases: "For an example of the model in action the `single_pixel_inversion_example.ipynb` notebook is the recommended place to start. It uses a library of functions defined in `utils.py` You will also need the"
"This repository contains the code for Radynversion, an Invertible Neural Network (INN) based tool that infers solar atmospheric properties during a solar flare"
"The code associated with this paper lives in this repository" and "For an example of the model in action the `single_pixel_inversion_example.ipynb` notebook is the recommended place to start."
